video_prompt: Hair subtly sways as a futuristic woman, with a determined expression, actively manipulates vibrant energy on a high ledge overlooking a neon cityscape. Her left hand generates a swirling, pulsating orb of purple and pink power. Luminous energy streams dramatically loop and flow around her right hand. Glowing neon blue lines pulsate across her form-fitting suit, conveying internal energy flow.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, ranging from more concise to slightly more detailed, depending on the model's complexity:

**Option 1 (Most Concise):**
A striking futuristic female figure in a dynamic, semi-crouching pose, manipulating swirling purple and pink energy. She wears a sleek, royal blue full-body suit with glowing neon blue circuit patterns and an armored shoulder piece. Determined expression, emerald green eyes, dark blue bob with purple/magenta streaks. Perched on a high ledge overlooking a sprawling, blurry, neon-lit cityscape at night. Dramatic high-contrast lighting, digital art, sci-fi fantasy blend.

**Option 2 (Slightly More Detail):**
A powerful futuristic woman in a dynamic, semi-crouching pose, with a determined expression and luminous emerald green eyes. She has a short dark blue bob with vibrant purple and magenta streaks. She wears a sleek, glossy royal blue full-body suit with intricate glowing neon blue circuit patterns, an armored shoulder piece, and dark boots. Her left hand casts a swirling purple and pink energy orb, while her right hand is surrounded by swirling purple and pink energy streams. Perched on a high metallic ledge overlooking a sprawling, blurry, neon-lit futuristic cityscape at night. Dramatic high-contrast lighting with glowing blues, purples, and pinks. Digital art, vertical composition, powerful sci-fi fantasy aesthetic.

**Option 3 (Key Nouns & Adjectives - often good for prompting):**
Striking futuristic woman, dynamic pose, manipulating glowing energy, swirling purple and pink energy orb, energy streams, determined expression, luminous emerald green eyes, dark winged eyeliner, short dark blue bob hair with purple and magenta streaks. Sleek glossy royal blue full-body suit, glowing neon blue circuit patterns, armored shoulder piece, dark boots. Semi-crouching on a high metallic ledge. Sprawling blurry neon-lit futuristic cityscape at night background. Dramatic high-contrast lighting, vibrant blues, purples, pinks. Digital art, vertical, powerful, sci-fi fantasy.

Choose the option that best fits the desired level of detail and your image generation model's typical prompt style. Option 2 provides a good balance.
refined_video_prompt: Hair sways as a determined woman actively manipulates vibrant energy. A swirling, pulsating orb of purple and pink power generates in her left hand. Luminous energy streams dramatically loop and flow around her right. Neon blue lines pulsate across her suit, conveying internal energy, while the neon cityscape below subtly shimmers.
